column1: “…in terms of Section 40 of the Act [EPF], where an offence under the Act is committed
by a body of persons then if such body of persons is a body corporate, every director
and officer of such body corporate shall be deemed to be guilty of the offence”.
Section 40 of the EPF Act reads as follows;
“Where an offence under this Act is committed by a body of persons, then-
